review: True friendship never die. That the film says. Ek saccha dost apne dost ke jaan bhi de deha hai. Yehi hai yeh kahani. Akshay and bobby both plays the true friendship character. They are very good friend. They do anything to make each other happy. The  script was bit old. But truly to say in acting wise and a friendship story wise i personally love this movie. Sach mein aaj kl aise dost nehi milta.
